_assets.title: Class 2 Medicines Recall (action within 48 hours): Vancomycin Powder for Concentrate for Solution for Infusion manufactured by Actavis Group PTC ehf (EL (14)A/06) (72Kb)

body:
## DRUG ALERT

CLASS 2 MEDICINES RECALL

Action within 48 hours

  


Hospital ward, pharmacy, clinic and wholesale level  
  
12 June 2014  |   |  EL (14)A/06  |   |  Our ref:  MDR 16-06/14   | 

* * *

Dear Healthcare Professional,

Actavis Group PTC ehf

Vancomycin Powder for Concentrate for Solution for Infusion 500mg - PL 30306/0444

Vancomycin Powder for Concentrate for Solution for Infusion 1000mg - PL 30306/0445

  
  
  
Product |   | Batch number |   | Expiry date |   | First distributed |   
Vancomycin Powder for Infusion 500mg |   | 5001039 |   | Mar-2015 |   | 26-Jun-2013 |   
5001066 |   | Apr-2015 |   | 15-Jul-2013 |   
5001177 |   | Jul-2015 |   | 13-Sep-2013 |   
5001231 |   | Aug-2015 |   | 16-Dec-2013 |   
5000830 |   | Oct-2014 |   | 14-Feb-2013 |   
Vancomycin Powder for Concentrate for Solution for Infusion 1000mg |   | 5001102 |   | May-2015 |   | 18-Sep-2013 |   
5001128 |   | Jun-2015 |   | 27-Dec-2013 |   
5001034 |   | Mar-2015 |   | 17-Oct-2013 |   
5001190 |   | Jul-2015 |   | 27-May-2014 | 

Actavis is recalling all remaining stock of the above batches to hospital ward, pharmacy, clinic and wholesale level. This is due to the potential for small particles of fibre material and glass to be present in individual vials, identified by Actavis’ third party manufacturer.

Remaining stocks of the affected batches should be quarantined and returned to the original supplier for credit. For enquiries relating to stock returns please contact Actavis Customer Services on 0800 373 573.

For medical information enquiries please contact Actavis Medical Information Department on 01271 385 257.

Recipients of this drug alert should bring it to the attention of relevant contacts by copy of this letter.

Adam Burgess  
Defective Medicines Report Centre  
151 Buckingham Palace Road  
London  
SW1W 9SZ  
Telephone +44 (0)20 3080 6574

MHRA Distribution (further recipients by cascade):  n/a 

### Download documents:  
  
  * [ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0)
